name: Dreamwalker Spaulders
tooltip:
Dreamwalker SpauldersLevel 60

Rayne at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make Dreamwalker Spaulders if you bring her the following: 1 Desecrated Spaulders, 12 Wartorn Leather Scraps, 5 Cured Rugged Hides and 1 Nexus Crystal.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Spaulders
- Wartorn Leather Scrap x 12
- Cured Rugged Hide x 5
- Nexus Crystal
